metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon
metas.description: Features a heartwarming friendship between a young Viking and a dragon, with stunning animation and exciting adventure.

metas.name: Moana
metas.description: An empowering musical adventure with beautiful animation, a strong female lead, and a sense of exploration.

metas.name: Paddington
metas.description: A charming and funny live-action film about a polite bear's adventures in London, full of warmth and humor.

metas.name: Paddington 2
metas.description: Even more delightful than the first, this sequel is filled with humor, heart, and a charmingly mischievous bear.

metas.name: Spies in Disguise
metas.description: A fun and action-packed animated comedy with a unique premise about secret agents and animal transformations.

metas.name: The Mitchells vs. the Machines
metas.description: A hilarious and visually inventive animated film about a quirky family's road trip that turns into a robot apocalypse adventure.

metas.name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
metas.description: A groundbreaking animated film with incredible visuals, a compelling story, and a fresh take on the superhero genre.

metas.name: Klaus
metas.description: A beautifully animated origin story of Santa Claus, filled with wit, charm, and a touching message about kindness.

metas.name: Vivo
metas.description: A vibrant musical adventure about a kinkajou who journeys from Havana to Miami to deliver a song.

metas.name: The Incredibles
metas.description: A classic Pixar film about a family of superheroes balancing their secret identities with everyday life, packed with action and humor.

metas.name: Ratatouille
metas.description: A charming and inspiring story about a rat with dreams of becoming a chef, featuring stunning animation and a delightful premise.

metas.name: Toy Story
metas.description: The groundbreaking original that started it all, a heartwarming tale of friendship and adventure from the perspective of toys.

metas.name: Toy Story 2
metas.description: A fantastic sequel that expands on the original's themes with more humor, heart, and exciting new characters.

metas.name: Toy Story 3
metas.description: An emotional and action-packed conclusion to the original trilogy, exploring themes of growing up and letting go.

metas.name: Toy Story 4
metas.description: A charming continuation of Woody and Buzz's adventures, introducing new characters and exploring the meaning of purpose.

metas.name: Finding Nemo
metas.description: A visually stunning and emotionally resonant adventure about a clownfish searching for his lost son.

metas.name: Finding Dory
metas.description: A delightful and humorous follow-up to Finding Nemo, focusing on Dory's journey to find her family.

metas.name: Up
metas.description: A poignant and adventurous story about an elderly man who embarks on a journey with a young Wilderness Explorer and a talking dog.

metas.name: Monsters, Inc.
metas.description: A creative and hilarious animated film about monsters who generate energy from children's screams, with a heartwarming twist.

metas.name: Monsters University
metas.description: A fun prequel that explores how Mike and Sulley became best friends during their college years.

metas.name: Cars
metas.description: A fun and visually appealing adventure about a race car who learns the value of friendship and community.

metas.name: Cars 3
metas.description: A more mature and reflective installment in the Cars franchise, with exciting racing sequences and themes of resilience.

metas.name: Despicable Me
metas.description: A hilarious and heartwarming story about a supervillain who adopts three orphan girls, featuring memorable characters and humor.

metas.name: Despicable Me 2
metas.description: Continues Gru's adventures with more laughs and charming interactions with the Minions and his new family.

metas.name: Minions
metas.description: A fun origin story for the beloved yellow creatures, packed with slapstick humor and a global adventure.

metas.name: Megamind
metas.description: A clever and funny animated film about a supervillain who accidentally creates a superhero, with a twist on the typical comic book narrative.

metas.name: Rio
metas.description: A vibrant and musical adventure set in the heart of Rio de Janeiro, featuring colorful animation and catchy songs.

metas.name: Rio 2
metas.description: Continues the colorful musical journey with more adventures and a focus on family and Brazilian culture.

metas.name: Epic
metas.description: A visually stunning animated adventure about a teenager who finds herself shrunk down into a hidden forest world.

metas.name: Home
metas.description: A charming and visually unique animated film about an alien who befriends a human girl, with a message of belonging.

metas.name: Arthur Christmas
metas.description: A witty and heartwarming animated comedy that reveals how Santa delivers all his presents in one night.

metas.name: The LEGO Movie
metas.description: An incredibly creative and hilarious animated film that is both a fun adventure and a clever satire.

metas.name: The LEGO Batman Movie
metas.description: A hilarious and action-packed spin-off that perfectly captures the humor and spirit of Batman.

metas.name: Chicken Run
metas.description: A stop-motion animated comedy with a clever plot and plenty of laughs as a group of chickens plot their escape.

metas.name: Wallace & Gromit: The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
metas.description: Another delightful stop-motion adventure featuring the inventive duo, this time tackling a garden-destroying beast.

metas.name: Ernest & Celestine
metas.description: A beautifully hand-drawn animated film about an unlikely friendship between a bear and a mouse, full of charm and warmth.

metas.name: The Illusionist
metas.description: A visually stunning and melancholic animated film about an aging magician whose career is fading.

metas.name: Mary and the Witch's Flower
metas.description: From the studio that brought you Studio Ghibli films, this is a magical adventure with a young girl discovering a mysterious flower.

metas.name: A Monster in Paris
metas.description: A charming animated musical set in Paris, featuring a friendly monster and a quest to save the city.

metas.name: The Little Prince
metas.description: A visually inventive and heartwarming adaptation of the classic book, blending animation styles to tell a timeless story.
